hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: Great location and nice staff. The chateau is absolutely stunning and the wellness area has a nice lounging area and pool.
neg review: There was no airconditioning in the room, just a fan. With 30 C degrees outside, it was not very pleasant to be in the room. There is no minibar in the room, so we couldn't keep our drinks and food cold. The dinner in the restaurant was OK, but not worth the price. Besides this, we had a nice stay!

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: The location and the Chateau itself were impressive, nice park around and very comfortable inside. Regretfully it was only a brief stop-over for us!
neg review: Parking is a bit away from the main entrance, so don't carry too much luggage with you.. Breakfast is not really cheap.

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: The surroundings are fabulous, pure nature, quiet, fresh air.
neg review: The staff nice enough but my impression was they started with their job the day before. Not very good at managing the small details which makes a tourist feel like on a holiday.  Under our room's windows, at 7:00 in the morning some workers straded their job and wasn't quite the planned time for a holiday wake-up.  Towels not so white

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: Grounds location are a peaceful and a romantic settings.
neg review: For the price I felt like the rooms could be better equipped such as aircon and a bar fridge.

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
neg review: A bit more snacks available at the bar. Coffeemaker in the room!

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: Loved the Restaurant ! Best food ever !
neg review: Our room was in an building with thin walls and one small window in our room. Not a great sensation
